title: Call Off The Search
description: The planet Bhan. For millennia, humanity has persecuted the beautiful and mysterious comyentis with a deep set hatred; burning their homes, driving them from their lands; murdering and enslaving them wherever they find them. Now, Sula, one of the last of her great and noble line, is fleeing for her life, with not just her own life but perhaps her whole speciesâ€™ cupped precariously within her hands.As a maelstrom of blood and fire slowly engulfs her, a man steps forth from the flames and reaches out to her...Should she trust him? Can she afford not to? Read "Call off the search" and cling to Sula as she fights for everything she holds dear.
author: Natasja Hellenthal
